title: SIPBS Summer Internships and Internship Matching
text: Welcome to the SIPBS Summer Internships and Internship Matching pages for the Strathclyde Institute of Pharmacy and Biomedical Sciences!

title: SIPBS Summer Internships and Internship Matching
text:
What is this site for?
These pages describe the SIPBS summer internship matching process and provide supporting information about this activity, including a list of potential internship opportunities

title: SIPBS Summer Internships and Internship Matching
text:
Getting started
We suggest that you start by looking over the description of the Matching process, Current Projects and External Funding under General Information. After that, please take a look at the Slides and complete the form if you wish to be considered for the matching process.

title: SIPBS Summer Internships and Internship Matching
text:

If this is not the case and any material displayed here violates copyright, please let me know and I will remove it.

title: Current Projects
text:
2 Project Descriptions

2.1 Dr T Bushell: Cytokine release from cultured human astrocytes
Keywords: astrocytes, protease-activated receptor-2 (PAR2), inflammation
We have shown that PAR2 activation may contribute to depression-like behaviour through cytokine release from activated astrocytes. In this study, we would examine the consequence of PAR2 activation and inhibition on cytokine release from cultured human astrocytes.
